property MaxAudioBytes: Integer read FMaxAudioBytes write FMaxAudioBytes
Use this property to set the absolute maximum audio bytes that will be encoded.

Get the maximum bitrate (in bits per second) of the Vorbis file.

Get the minimum bitrate (in bits per second) of the Vorbis file.
property MinimumBitrate : TVorbisBitRate read FMinimumBitrate write SetMinimumBitrate
Set the minimum bitrate limit for the file being created.
property Mode : TMSConverterMode read FMode write FMode
Mode property affects the way the mono stream is converted into stereo.
property Mode : TAudioMixerMode read FMode write FMode
This property sets the mode for the TAudioMixer.

property Mute : Boolean read FMute write SetMute
If this property is set to True the component doesn’t play audio, but just lets it pass through.
property NominalBitrate: Integer read GetNominalBitrate
Get the nominal bitrate (in bits per second) of the Vorbis file.

property OnDone : TOutputDoneEvent read FOnDone write FOndone
OnDone event is raised when the component has finished its job or was stopped asynchronously.

OnProgress event is raised periodically to indicate output progress.
property OnThreadException : TThreadExceptionEvent read FOnThreadException write FOnThreadException
This event is raised if an exception has occurred.

The input stream sample rate in Herz.

function Seek(SampleNum : Int64) : Boolean
This method allows you to change the current playing position in the the input component.
property Seekable : Boolean read FSeekable
This read only property indicates when the input is seekable.
property Seekable : Boolean read FSeekable write FSeekable
By default the TSreamIn component treats the stream it works with as non-seekable.
function SeekInternal(var SampleNum : Int64) : Boolean; override
Performs the file seeking.
property Serial : Integer read FSerial write FSerial
Set the serial number of the logical bitstream in the Vorbis file.
function SetEndTime(Minutes, 
Seconds : LongWord) : Boolean
This function is a wrapper around EndSample property, provided for convenience.
function SetStartTime(Minutes, 
Seconds : LongWord) : Boolean
This function is a wrapper around StartSample property, provided for convenience.
property Size : Int64 read FSize
A read only property which returns input data size in bytes.
Bits of code to do things related to NewAC.
property StartPos : TCDPosition read FStartPos write SetSP
Set this property to specify the starting position for data transfer in a TCDPosition format.
property StartSample : Int64 read FStartSample write FStartSample
Set this property’s value to the sample (frame) you want the input to start playing from.
property StartTrack: Integer read FStartTrack write SetSt
Set StartTrack to specify the starting position for data transfer at the beginning of the track identified by number.
property Status : TOutputStatus read GetStatus
This read only property indicates the output component’s current status.
property Status: TCDStatus read GetStatus
Read Status to get a TCDStatus about the drive.
procedure Stop(Async : Boolean = True)
Stops the busy component or does nothing if the component is idle.
You can stop a playing chain by calling an output component’s Stop method.
property Stream : TStream read FStream write SetStream
Use this property to set the input data stream for the input component.
This component reads raw audio samples from a TStream-compatible object you provide.
Writing new components for NewAC is quite easy.
property Tags : TVorbisTags read FTags write SetTags
Use this property to add a set of Vorbis-style comments (artist, title, etc.)
General information about the disc in the drive.
The status of the CD-ROM drive.
You can call the output component’s Stop method to terminate an ongoing playback at any time, but because of the multithreaded nature of NewAC the playback doesn’t stop at once when requested.
Some of NewAC components require certain shared libraries, which are not included in the package but are publicly available and may be found on many sites both in source and binary forms.
property ThreadPriority : {$IFDEF LINUX} Integer {$ENDIF} {$IFDEF WIN32} TThreadPriority {$ENDIF} read GetPriority write SetPriority
This property allows you to set the priority of the output thread.
property TimeElapsed : Integer read GetTE
The time in seconds that has passed since the playback was started.
Here is a collection of hints and code snippets related to NewAC or audio processing in general.
property TotalBlocks: Integer read GetTotalBlocks
The total number of blocks in the file.
property TotalSamples : Int64 read GetTotalSamples
A read only property which returns number of samples (frames) in the input stream.
property TotalTime : LongWord read GetTotalTime
A read only property which returns input playback time in seconds.
property Tracks[const vIndex : Integer] : TCDTrackInfo read GetTrackInfo
Returns information about a track specified by its number.
property TracksCount : Integer read GetNumTracks
The number of tracks on the disc.

property Underruns : LongWord read FUnderruns
This read only property returns the number of internal buffer underruns that have occured during playback.

This read only property returns the number of internal buffer underruns that have occured during playback.
Almost all NewAC components that read data from audio files or store data in audio file format can work with both disk files and memory streams (currently only TMACIn and TMACOut components do not support general streams).
